Translation.Original: The main key to open Rampage
Don't forget to save settings after changing.
Translation.Replace: 更改后不要忘记保存设置

Translation.Original: The main key to open Rampage with Controller
Enable support for XBox / PS controllers.

Translation.Replace: 菜单单击和切换时的声音

Translation.Original: This will log more info to RampageLog.log
Translation.Replace: 这将把更多信息记录到RampageLog.log中
将窗口重置为默认位置

Translation.Original: Toggle the globe on Rectangle header.
Enable teleport map under teleport options.
Translation.Replace: 在传送选项下启用传送地图

Translation.Original: See yourself and destinations on a map.
Translation.Replace: 在地图上查看自己和目的地

Translation.Original: Enable vehicle pictures in vehicle spawner.
Translation.Replace: 在车辆生成器中启用车辆图片
显示右上角的窗口激活器面板

Translation.Original: Load and Save config to file.
Translation.Replace: 加载并保存配置到文件

Translation.Original: This will load the optimal settings.
Enable key to activate mouse support.
Translation.Replace: 启用键以激活鼠标支持

Translation.Original: Teleports you to waypoint on press.
Translation.Replace: 按下此键时传送你到导航点
按下此键时修复你的载具

Translation.Original: Enable key to activate cmd input.
Translation.Replace: 启用键以激活控制台输入
将当前设置保存到文件
编辑线下角色统计信息

Translation.Original: Customize Rampage to your own like.
Play effects on your player model
Translation.Replace: 在玩家模型上播放效果
你的玩家成为无敌模式

Translation.Original: Your player regenerates max health when damaged.
Translation.Replace: 你的玩家在受到伤害时恢复最大生命值
你的玩家变成幽灵模式

Translation.Original: Disable ped ragdoll on impact or fall.
Translation.Replace: 在碰撞或坠落时禁用ped布娃娃效果

Translation.Original: Your ped can jump much higher.
Your ped can run extremely fast.
Allows you to warp through some objects.
Creates a clone of your current model.
Only works if you use the AddonPeds mod
Enter custom model name or hash.
Translation.Replace: 输入自定义模型名称或哈希值
显示日期和时间（现实时间）
显示当前现实日期和时间
改变游戏性摄像头缩放

Translation.Original: Use old gta 2 top down cam.

Translation.Replace: 乘坐集装箱，需要自行车

Translation.Original: Walk or Drive over the air.

Translation.Replace: 较高的值=较低的帧速率
启用多人游戏地图组件
瞄准时使用激光指示器

Translation.Original: Adjust the global level of detail.
High values can crash the game.
Translation.Replace: 高值可能会使游戏崩溃

Translation.Original: This removes the slomo inside the weapon wheel.
Translation.Replace: 这将移除武器轮内的时间缓慢效果

Translation.Original: For allowing single player modding in gta v.
Translation.Replace: 允许单人在gta v中进行改装

Translation.Original: For the nativedb and all documentation arround it.
As audio library to play mp3 files.
Jumping peds and vehicles around you.
Translation.Replace: 在你周围跳跃的人和载具

Translation.Original: Rockets are falling from the sky.

Translation.Replace: 删除世界上的所有可拾取物

Translation.Original: This will delete only the vehicles.
Sets the force strength of blackhole
Change the way how force gets applied to entities.
Translation.Replace: 更改将力应用于实体的方式
